item.title: Traffic light facing the wrong way, 4th July
item.description:
The traffic light on Footscray Road, on the centre crossing between Chattertons Estate Agents and Pop Street, should be facing oncoming traffic from the station side of Footscray Road, but it has been turned around to face completely the wrong direction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 405, Footscray Road, New Eltham, London

item.title: Unique Style Flyposters on all exits of roundabout, 4th July
item.description:
Please check carefully as there are 4 of these advertising boards on this junction. Bromley Road Junction of Camden Park Road, Chislehurst. Please will you fine this company for littering our streets with their advertising junk. What3Words of the locations ///doors.angle.films ///shop.shiny.than ///wings.notes.hike

item.title: Blocked / smell from drains, 4th July
item.description:
There's smells coming from the drains on the street which indicates there might be an issue with sewage flowing in the pipes. Flagging on the back of a leaflet coming through the door on the risk of flooding for basement flats and I wouldn't want this to add to the risk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hurst Street, Herne Hill, London

item.title: Littering on Portnall Road, 4th July
item.description:
Extreme, constant litter problem in Portnall Road, towards Harrow Road and cross roads. Street cleaning team is doing their best but impossible to keep up as it is an ongoing and persistent issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Portnall Road, Kensal Town, London

item.title: Veolia cleaning company, Tottenham haven't cleaned my street for five.years, 4th July
item.description:
Https://youtu.be/h3tot5L6FZw Https://youtu.be/VCrAYnC_vpc Hi from mr webster today's date is the 4th of july 2025 thank you so much for getting back to me i do appreciate it this is regarding that you have not done work Sweep in my street. Copy 04/07/25 Dear Mr Webster, Thank you for your email dated 3rd July 2025. While we are always open to receiving feedback regarding our services, What services? When your people come down and steal from me, is that the service you're talking about? I must respectfully ask that future communication remains courteous I am being courteous to the lowlife pieces of shit that lie lowball me when it comes to paying a bill. Because of stuff they have stolen.I do understand that the office working uni is very delicate in nature and can't handle straightforward talk. If at any point you wish to meet up, we could discuss this face to face. And respectful. Is it respectful your guys coming down twice and stealing from my front garden? Is that what an office little shit calls respect? The language and tone used in your message are unacceptable good and will not be tolerated. What is the office working uni idiot gonna do? You gonna wag your finger at me? I'm really terrified. We have raised your concerns with our management team, Useless bunch of lying winkers. And the relevant supervisor will reviewthe issue regarding cleansing and sweeping in your area. Like they've done several times before and nothing else has happened. Like I said, useless winkers. Today's date is the 4th of July 2025. On the 3rd of July I was told by this man Taeeba Mahmood that they would come down and clean. today no no no cctv say no However, please be advised that if this type of abusive or threatening communication continues, we will have no choice but to escalate the matter to council officials. oh my god please do that i'm begging you then i can explain to the council officials who are going to do nothing that you haven't been doing any cleaning down here you haven't been doing any sweeping down here for the last five years go for it All on CCTV. i'm begging you guess who's gonna get in trouble not me you're the ones who are going to get in trouble let's see if they renew your contract Make sure veolia shit people understand something. Harringay council are not my boss. they are yours While we are here to assist, You've never assisted anyone. You're a lying piece of crap. All correspondence must be conducted in a professional and respectful manner. You know what you can do with a chair leg? Kind regards, Roz Belghrous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Anti social behaviour, 4th July
item.description:
Please have some police present in the park between Page street and Horseferry Rd. People seem to sell ( ? ) and take.... "substances". Large groups of men and women loudly argue about money, intoxicated, swearing, right next to children playing... Every park seem to be like this lately..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Page Street, Millbank, London

item.title: Veolia cleaning company, Tottenham haven't cleaned my street for five.years, 4th July
item.description:
Hi from Mr Webster, third e-mail regarding non sweeping of my Rd for the last five years. Today's date again is the 3rd of July 2025. Taeeba Mahmood enquiries.haringey@veolia.com Just to make sure that we're on the same page, veolia lie all the time. copy Dear Mr Webster, Thank you for your email. I can confirm that is scheduled for street sweeping every Friday. No, that is a load of bull unless it's new. Tomorrow is Friday the 4th of July 2025. We see if any cleaning happens. I have highlighted this matter to our Environment Manager to ensure this road is swept tomorrow. We will see. Once again thank you for your email and should you have any further queries/complaints please do not hesitate to contact us on 020 8885 7700 between 8.30am to 5.30pm (Monday â€“ Friday) or alternatively via email at enquiries.haringey@veolia.com Regards Taeeba Mahmood

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple mattresses and furniture fly tipping, 4th July
item.description:
There have been several items dumped recently that are causing obstruction, health concerns, and general distress for local residents. The most notable items that require urgent removal include: â€¢ A large mattress, dumped right outside my property 247A Croydon Road â€¢ Pieces of furniture, including a sofa, left in alleyway further down that road These items have been left for several days and are attracting vermin as well as posing a potential fire and safety hazard. The fly-tipping is contributing to a decline in the cleanliness and overall environment of the area. Please could a waste removal team be dispatched at your earliest convenience to clear these items? I am happy to provide photos or further details if required. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramerton Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No Black bin collection, 4th July
item.description:
Once again the black bins have not received collection in the estate. No reason was provided to the residents the last time and communication to the reason along with notification of plan to rectify would be appreciated.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Greenland Mews, New Cross Gate, London

item.title: Trip hazzard, 4th July
item.description:
Already reported 2 weeks+ago. These weeds have been left to grow, increasing in size so that now they are a trip hazard. This is outside a house where a 96 year old lady lives. Are you going to be responsible for her being hospitalised having stumbled over them?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
